text: Metro 2033 is a 2002 post-apocalyptic novel by Russian author Dmitry Glukhovsky. It is set within the Moscow Metro, where the last survivors hide after a global nuclear holocaust. It has been followed by two sequels, Metro 2034 and Metro 2035, and spawned the Metro media franchise. Category:2002 books Category:Russian novels
title: Metro 2033 (novel)
